definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: The slides show taxes paying form of tax system of Republic of Uzbekistan.
sentences.chinese: 幻灯片提供的是乌兹别克斯坦共和国税务系统纳税表。

sentences.english: Real estate is very much a tax-driven industry.
sentences.chinese: 房地产属于税务驱动型行业。

sentences.english: Our company employed a tax consultant so that we pay less tax.
sentences.chinese: 我们请了一位税务咨询师，以便我们少交点税。

sentences.english: Zero-coupon securities have little risk, but they do have a few tax disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 零息债券没有什么风险，但他们确实有少数税务缺点。

sentences.english: Democratic leaders think this is a matter of basic tax fairness.
sentences.chinese: 民主党领袖认为这是个税务公平的基本问题。

sentences.english: The answer is, it depends, and you should consult a tax professional.
sentences.chinese: 看情况而定，你应该咨询税务专业人士。

sentences.english: Special depreciation represents deduction for wear and tear on an asset from a purely tax-based point of view.
sentences.chinese: 特殊折旧指一个资产基于税务观点的损耗。

sentences.english: Do you cheat on your taxes?
He had been cheating the taxman for years.
sentences.chinese: 数年来，他一直欺骗罟税务部门。

sentences.english: Our company employed a tax consultant so that we can pay less tax.
sentences.chinese: 我们请了一位税务咨询师，以便我们少交点税。

sentences.english: Tax peccadillos got him off to a bad start with lawmakers.
sentences.chinese: 税务上的过失，使他与立法者有一个坏的开始。

sentences.english: It is possible the tax write-off alone will make homebuying right for you.
sentences.chinese: 可能税务减免是你购房时的有利因素。

sentences.english: I would like to know, in Nanxiong do not have a civil tax income of gray?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，在南雄做税务公务员有没有灰色收入？

sentences.english: ETD leads to both micro-cosmic and macro-cosmic effects.
sentences.chinese: 企业税务筹划会产生宏观和微观双重效应。

sentences.english: The competent tax authorities shall strengthen their management on the business accounting of tax deduction ledgers .
sentences.chinese: 主管税务机关应加强对税款抵扣台帐核算的管理。

sentences.english: The forth chapter conceive the direction way to the Chinese tax affairs informationization construction.
sentences.chinese: 第四章对我国税务信息化的发展道路进行了构想。

definition: to file an income tax return/to declare dutiable goods (at customs)
